mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO exam_answers ( attempt_id, question_id, question_type_id, submitted_answer, is_correct, score, is_graded ) VALUES
(#{attemptId}, #{answer.questionId}, #{answer.questionTypeId}, #{answer.submittedAnswer}, #{answer.isCorrect}, #{answer.score}, #{answer.isGraded})
mapper.select: SELECT ea.*, q.title as question_title, q.answer as correct_answer, q.explanation FROM exam_answers ea LEFT JOIN questions q ON ea.question_id = q.id WHERE ea.attempt_id = #{attemptId} ORDER BY q.id
mapper.update: UPDATE exam_answers SET is_correct = #{isCorrect}, score = #{score}, grading_comment = #{gradingComment}, is_graded = true, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
